patthana16.75:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.75:2.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:4.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ noupādā ca anidassanaappaṭighaṃ noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.75:5.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
